post.text:

comment.author: Marisa
comment.text: The Today show says you're behind. I know you will win. Between emails and rise in Healthcare prices people will vote for you.

replies.author: Marisa
replies.text: I moved from Oregon last year to Alaska. Alaska is a red state. So is Oregon. But the polls show it as blue. So irritating.
